page.title: 07A Day in My Life (Mousehole)
page.content: Today is Sunday so I stayed in bed till eleven o'clock. I then discovered that we were having dinner early so we could spend more time walking in the afternoon and I had nearly missed it! After dinner we walked down to the railway station and had a look at the {train}comemmorating one hundred and fifty years of G.W.R. (Great Western Railways). Inside the{train}there was an exibition of information on the G.W.R. We then walked to{Newlyn}and and had a look at the open day at the lifeboat station. At the open day they had the local crime prevention car which told you to get out if you sat in it.
